lyrics:
4 contributorsdesire me lyricsverse 1
desire me desire me
as i desire you
desire me and want me
thats all ill ever ask of life
that you will someday come to me
and say that you love me
as i love you
mmm

verse 2
desire me and tell me
that you are mine and mine alone
desire me and love me
and be the queen upon my throne
for i will always worship you
no matter where you go or what you do

bridge
mmm
there comes a time in the life of every boy
when one and only one girl will do
so now the time has come and i know that youre the one
and all that i will ever want is you

verse 3
so desire me desire me
thats all ill ever ask of you
desire me and love me
and tell me that you want me too
for nothing else will matter in the world
as long as i am close to you
you might also likebridge
mmm
there comes a time in the life of every boy
when one and only one girl will do
so now the time has come and i know that youre the one
and all that i will ever want is you

verse 3
so desire me desire me
thats all ill ever ask of you
desire me and tell me
that you will always want me too
for nothing else will matter in the world
as long as i am close to you

outro
nothing else will matter darling
if im close to you
please please tell me ill always be
close to you
woah ohembed
